title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 22.5 - Classification of occupational lund disease
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 22.5 - Classification of occupational lund disease

State Regulations

For purposes of reporting occupational lung disease as required by section
22.4
of this Part, occupational lung disease shall be categorized according to the following probable causative agents or nomenclature as applicable. Coal workers lung disease

Silicosis

Absestosis/Asbestos-related lung disease

Berylliosis

Talcosis

Hard metal diseases (Titanium, Cobalt)

Byssinosis

Bronchitis due to occupational exposure

Hypersensitivity Pneumonitis (occupational)

Occupational asthma

Other occupational lung disease

Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
22.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
